Broken_Cheese_Slope,"2014-10-28T23:35:51.74Z","Return of BIONICLE Mask Collecting","

This clear mask was given away at New York Comic Con 2014. It comes in a rather small plastic box with a thin paper inside. The paper says that it is 1
column2: of 1500, that it was made in 4 countries(For one part?), and has a link to BIONICLE.com.

column1: The mask is rather small and clear. It has hinges so that it can attach to the new BIONICLE head piece. The mask is the same as the ones in
column2: 70787-1: Tahu Master of Fire but are in gold in red in that set. The mask is currently odd due to lack of story significance and no set compatibility yet.&nbsp

column1: I would only suggest you buy this set if you are an ultimate LEGO or BIONCLE

,TRUE,4,5,3,2,5 williamfurno","2014-12-23T22:59:56.873Z","Exclusive Tahu Mask from NYCC 2014!","

I think LEGO has made a great move by bringing back collectibles. This one, small mask offers a variety of fans to come spending everything in their wallets just to get a really cool, completely trans Tahu Mask. This mask is a clear version of 70787 Tahu - Master of Fire but can be attached to any of the other new Bionicle head molds. If you are a die-hard collector, I highly recommend trying to get this. I bought this for $35 off of
column2: eBay and just to have this rare&nbsp
column3: mask in my collection is just great! &nbsp

column1:
,TRUE,5,5,1,2,1 rioforce","2015-02-11T20:01:01.713Z","Definately a collector's item","

I won this set on a LEGO Twitter giveaway while ComicCon was going on. It was random chance, but I was one of the retweeters chosen. When I got the mask in the mail, I opened the package to see a nice transparent mask. When I got it, the Bionicle 2015 sets were not out yet, so there was no compatibility, but I did manage to get the mask to fit on a small brickbuilt stand I made from LEGO System parts.
The box was fine, it was a thin plastic, easily openable and closeable, with no cutting necessary.

column2: s item. It has no significance n the Bionicle storyline, and is just a transparent Tahu mask.
